com.tractrac.model.lib.api.route

Interface IControlRoute

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAttachable, IIdentifiable, IMetadataContainer, INamed, IPropertiesContainer, IRoute

    public interface IControlRoute
extends IRoute

    A route based on a number of controls/waypoints/control points.

    The route and controls can be static, i.e. they do not change over time, or they can be dynamic, i.e. the route changes

    A static route often occurs in adventure races, orienteering, where a number of predefined controls is to be visited, usually in the specified order.

    A dynamic route occurs within sailing: Depending on the weather (the wind) the route can be shortened or changed in case of a shift in the wind direction. Also the controls can float with the current and thereby move in time.

    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jesper Grooss
    See Also:
    IRoute}
